properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 2:24AM MST until February 12 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, occasional snow
showers. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. For
the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow
accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, mainly across eastern
Archuleta County.

* WHERE...Southwest San Juan Mountains.

* WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 8 AM MST
this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 5
PM this afternoon to midnight MST Tuesday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. A detailed map of
the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MST TUESDAY NIGHT
